moves.name: Meteor Mash
moves.effect: Has a small chance of raising the user’s Attack.

moves.name: Iron Head
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of making the target flinch.

moves.name: Best There Is!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense. Ensures that the user’s next attack will be a critical hit. If Metagross has Mega Evolved, makes the user able to endure the next hit it takes.

syncMove.name: Solid Steel Meteor Mash
syncMove.description: Become Mega Metagross until the end of the battle.

passives.name: Power Chain 3
passives.description: Powers up moves when unity bonus is in effect.
